body: I cannot reproduce this and I create a test PR in #30539. Maybe you can upgrade to 1.21.11 and try again?

@lunny I upgraded to 1.21.11 and tried again, but it's still the same error.
The version:
![image](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/assets/38375081/3a56951c-712c-4741-b957-8f515bd8fefc)

The request:
![image](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/assets/38375081/28a2ca32-001b-43b7-9f02-bba3e17d9eb3)

The response:
![image](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/assets/38375081/3e5cdda4-acd4-41da-9d42-d48efea68d85)
Please input `token <your_token>` in `AuthorizationHeaderToken (apiKey)` of the `Authorized` and try again.

@lunny Like this? Seems to be the same result:

![image](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/assets/38375081/0ec7eb07-68fc-4795-b3dd-3f87ebb1d932)
Can you get the information about this request/response from Gitea's log?

It is a bug of `go-chi/binding`.

Main branch doesn't have such bug because its dependency has been upgraded.

On 1.21 branch, run `go get gitea.com/go-chi/binding` then build a new binary, then there won't be such bug.
